mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hand-written land sale document
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a hand-written document that describes the sale of land. The seller is Elizabeth Duncan, the purchaser is James T. Walters and Davis K. Duncan. The amount of land is described as 222 54/160 acers.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
